rooms.description: Scandinavian styled living area with ample natural light and minimalist decor. Features large windows facing north for optimal daylight in accordance with Vastu principles.
Functional Scandinavian kitchen with modern fixtures and energy-efficient appliances, incorporating ergonomic layouts that promote a positive flow of energy per Vastu guidelines.
Open dining space integrated within the living area. Minimalist Scandinavian design with light color palettes and ample natural lighting.
Spacious master bedroom designed in a Scandinavian style, incorporating calming colors and clutter-free spaces, oriented ideally for positive energy flow according to Vastu principles.

openings.description: The main entrance is positioned at the north-eastern side of the building ensuring a good flow of energy and aligning with Vastu principles. The door leads directly to a central courtyard.
Large windows are strategically placed on the south-west walls for balanced light distribution, in line with Scandinavian design aesthetics and Vastu compliance.
Additional ventilation openings near the central courtyard to allow continuous airflow and ensure energy balance per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom on the second floor designed in a Scandinavian style with neutral palettes, providing privacy and an airy feel.
Cozy study or workspace area integrated into the living space. Minimalistic design with ample storage solutions to maintain a clutter-free environment in line with Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A centrally located staircase provides access between floors, ensuring smooth circulation of both people and energy, aligning with Vastu principles.
Though not common in a studio apartment, an optional elevator well can be integrated if required by building norms. This ensures minimal disruption to the flow of energy.

A central courtyard acts as a transitional space that connects the apartment with the large garden. Designed to foster natural light and ventilation, it adheres to Vastu principles of openness and energy flow.

Access point from the central courtyard to an expansive garden. The garden is designed with native flora and Scandinavian minimalist landscaping, creating a serene environment that complies with Vastu norms.
